ARABIC: نَحْنُ قَدَّرْنَا بَيْنَكُمُ ٱلْمَوْتَ وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمَسْبُوقِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: We have decreed death for you and We will not be forestalled
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We have incorporated death in your constitution, and We shall not be hindered
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: It is We Who ordained death upon you and We are not to be frustrated.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We have destined death for you and no one can challenge Us
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: It is We Who have ordained death among you, and We have not been beaten –
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: We have decreed death to you all, and We are not outstripped,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: We have ordained death among you and We are not to be overcome,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: We have decreed among you Death; We shall not be outstripped;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: We mete out death among you, and We are not to be outrun,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: It is We who have ordained death for all of you; and We cannot be prevented
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: We! it is We Who have decreed death Unto you all. And We are not to be outrun.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We have ordained death among you, and We are not to be outmaneuvered
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: We have decreed Death to be your common lot, and We are not to be frustrated
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: We have decreed death to you all, and We are not unable,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: It was We who decreed death among you. We will not be surpassed
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We have decreed death among you, and We will not be outstripped.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: We have decreed death among you, and We are not to be outdone
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:60] We have ordained (read qaddarnā or qadarnā) death among you, and We are not to be outmanoeuvred from, We are not incapable [of],
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (We mete out death among you) We made you equal as far as death is concerned, such that all of you will die; it is also said that this means: We apportioned between you your lifespan until you die. Some of you will live to 100 years, others to 80, some to 50, some to more and others to less, (and We are not to be outrun) and We are capable of doing so,
